sourcesContent:
<template>
  <van-image
    width="180px"
    height="180px"
    round
    fit="cover"
    class="rotateimg"
    :class="
      store.state.isplay &&
      store.state.audio.played &&
      store.state.audio.readyState == 4
        ? 'active'
        : ''
    "
    :src="store.state.songlist[store.state.curret].al.picUrl"
    @click="attrs.lyricsstate()"
  >
    <template v-slot:loading>
      <van-loading
        type="spinner"
        size="20"
        color="#000"
      /> </template></van-image
></template>

<script>
import { useStore } from "vuex";
export default {
  setup(props, { attrs }) {
    const store = useStore();
    return {
      store,
      attrs,
    };
  },
};
</script>

<style lang="less" scoped>
.active {
}
</style>
